submission:
class Solution:
  def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
    mod = 1000000007
    n = len(nums)
    max_num = max(nums)
    dp_non_decreasing = [[0 for _ in range(max_num + 1)] for _ in range(n)]
    dp_non_increasing = [[0 for _ in range(max_num + 1)] for _ in range(n)]
    for i in range(nums[0] + 1):
      dp_non_decreasing[0][i] = 1
      dp_non_increasing[0][nums[0] - i] = 1

    for i in range(1, n):
      num = nums[i]
      
      sum_non_decreasing = 0
      sum_non_increasing = 0
      
      for j in range(max_num, num, -1):
        sum_non_increasing += dp_non_increasing[i - 1][j]
      
      for j in range(num + 1):
        sum_non_decreasing += dp_non_decreasing[i - 1][j]
        sum_non_increasing += dp_non_increasing[i - 1][num - j]
        
        dp_non_decreasing[i][j] = min(sum_non_decreasing, sum_non_increasing)
        dp_non_increasing[i][num - j] = min(sum_non_decreasing, sum_non_increasing)
    
    ret = 0
    for j in range(nums[-1] + 1):
      ret = (ret + dp_non_decreasing[-1][j]) % mod
    return ret
